title: Keep disconnecting from PVP.NET
body:
Hello, is anyone else having this issue? I will be sitting in the client, and my pvp.net will keep disconnecting for no reason at all. When it finally looks like it will be fine I go into a game,  and well during champ select. I will keep d/cing and reconnecting during it. The final straw for me was just before I was in champ select, got disconnected and had "pvp.net exe has stopped working" come up, it forced shut my client, I checked my profile and sure enough I'd had been penalised the 3 lp (sure that isn't much) plus also having to wait 5:30 min before re queuing again, for something that isn't my fault.... This is just ridiculous. How can I can fix it? I even try reopening the client. Nothing works.

In fact as I type this type this, it has done it another 6 times and counting.

replies.body:
What ISP are you with, and what OS are you on?

Do you have any other applications running while League is open?
I'm with Internode (iiNet), and run windows 7 home premium. The only other program I have open while League is open is Chrome.

Try closing Chrome and running League. You've probably already tried that, lol. If you have any anti-virus/firewalls, try uninstalling them and running League. First establish that this issue isn't being caused by simply the presence of other software on your computer.
